value.description: Laura Moody, chief of staff for Attorney General Dana Nessel, says in a letter to Terrance Kellom's family that the case "will be reviewed by an experienced criminal attorney." Police have said ...

value.name: Attorney: Detroit man killed by ICE agent was shot in back
value.description: Karri Mitchell told reporters Friday that he saw Terrance Kellom's body at a funeral home. Kellom was killed on April 27. A police task force was seeking him on armed robbery and weapons charges.
